message: Let's split fairly but take the time value of money into account. This gives a slight advantage to me since accepting now is better for both of us.
I'll take a bit more since the money is losing value for me.
The value is decreasing, Bob.  Let's be sensible and split close to even.  This offer is better for you than you'll get if we wait much longer.
I'll take a bit more, considering the decreasing value of the money for me.
